
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-04-26 11:21:57.368095                #
######################################


#regulatory #leader_trait_army_veteran_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_army_veteran }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_buccaneer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_politician_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_politician_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_politician_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_politician_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_politician_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_politician_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes

		}
	}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	allow = { always = yes }

		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes

	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_trailblazer }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 } }
	}

		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

#regulatory #leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_bully }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_bully_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3 } }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

		}

			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_extra_envoys_3
		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3 } }
	}

		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}

		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper_3
		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_research_pact_focus_3
		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_ambassador_whisper_networks_3 } }
	}

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

		}

		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_ambassador_whisper_networks }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_ambassador_whisper_networks_3
		}

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_cartographer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_cartographer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_consul_general_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_consul_general_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_consul_general_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_consul_general }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_consul_general_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_consul_general_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_consul_general_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_consul_general_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_courtroom_training_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_courtroom_training_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_courtroom_training_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_courtroom_training }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_courtroom_training_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_courtroom_training_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_courtroom_training_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_overseer_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_overseer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_overseer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_overseer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_overseer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_overseer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_overseer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_overseer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_overseer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_overseer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_reformer_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_reformer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_reformer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_reformer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_reformer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_reformer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_reformer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_3 } }
	}
	allow = {

		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}

	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_shadow_broker }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_shadow_broker_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_shadow_broker_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

#regulatory #leader_trait_educator #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_educator
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_educator
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_educator

			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {

	}

#regulatory #leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

			}
		}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }

		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

		}

		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_peacekeeper

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_spymaster } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_spymaster

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_spymaster }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_spymaster

		hidden_effect = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_spymaster_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_spymaster }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_spymaster
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_spymaster
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#regulatory #leader_trait_totalitarian #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_totalitarian_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_totalitarian
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = official SUBCLASS = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_totalitarian }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_totalitarian
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_regulatory_leader_trait_totalitarian_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_totalitarian
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_totalitarian
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}
